Title: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow
Writer: Malvin Wald (teleplay), Jack Jacobs (teleplay), Thomas C. Chapman (teleplay), Washington Irving (story)
Actors: Jeff Goldblum, Paul Sand, Meg Foster, Laura Campbell
Plot: Angered that Katrina has grown fond of schoolmaster Crane, Brom Bones determines to scare off the interloper by filling his head with spooky tales of a Headless Horseman. Crane disparages the legends, until one fateful ride home in the dark of night.
